title: Responses of CO2 and CH4 in the alpine wetlands of the Tibetan Plateau to warming and nitrogen and phosphorus additions
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00174E, Paper
Wenbao Zhang, Huijuan Xin, Zongxing Li, Qiao Cui, Bin Xu, Biao Tang, Yaning Wang, Chong Xu, Jian Xue
Wetland ecosystems store large amounts of carbon, and CO2 and CH4 fluxes from this ecosystem receive the double impact of climate change and human activities.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
